source: TEXT_REGOTH3SAKAZUKI_00407_IHAKI_000_000<tab>Hm...? You're no pirate. Well, whoever you are, I hope you have a good reason to be here.
target:
TEXT_REGOTH3SAKAZUKI_00407_IHAKI_000_000<tab>なんだ、アンタ？
その風体……外の海からやってきた異人か？
ここは、オレたち海賊衆の物見砦「サカズキ島」だ！
TEXT_REGOTH3SAKAZUKI_00407_A1_000_001<tab>あなたのことを教えてほしい

source: TEXT_REGOTH3SAKAZUKI_00407_IHAKI_000_010<tab>If it is not obvious from the uniform, I am a member of the Confederacy. Fifteen years have passed since I joined, and while I cannot claim myself to be an indispensable part of our organization, I am pretty important.
target:
TEXT_REGOTH3SAKAZUKI_00407_IHAKI_000_010<tab>見ての通りの海賊だ。
海賊衆に入って、もう15年かそこらか……
古株とまでは言えないが、中堅ってところだな。

source: TEXT_REGOTH3SAKAZUKI_00407_IHAKI_000_011<tab>I am one of our main lookouts. Day in and day out I inspect the seas, making sure that all the ships passing through here have paid their dues.
target:
TEXT_REGOTH3SAKAZUKI_00407_IHAKI_000_011<tab>帆別銭を払わず抜け駆けする船がいないか、
日がな一日、見張りを続けるのがお役目よ。

source: TEXT_REGOTH3SAKAZUKI_00407_IHAKI_000_012<tab>It's not exactly the most thrilling work. I have lost count of the number of times I fell asleep while on duty. In fact, some days are so boring you find yourself almost wishing someone wouldn't pay the Ruby Tithe... Ahem. Not that <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> ever have, mind you.
target:
TEXT_REGOTH3SAKAZUKI_00407_IHAKI_000_012<tab>これがまた、眠くなるのなんの……。
不埒な輩が現れてくれれば、大捕物を楽しめるんだが、
それはちょいと、不謹慎ってもんだな。

source: TEXT_REGOTH3SAKAZUKI_00407_IHAKI_000_020<tab>This is Sakazuki─one of the Confederacy's main outposts. From here we survey the coming and going of ships, and collect the Ruby Tithe from all those that pass this way.
target:
TEXT_REGOTH3SAKAZUKI_00407_IHAKI_000_020<tab>海賊衆が建てた物見砦だ。
この紅玉海を行き交う船を見張り、
通行料である「帆別銭」を徴集するのが主な役割だな。

source: TEXT_REGOTH3SAKAZUKI_00407_IHAKI_000_021<tab>While we have several other sites dedicated to the surveillance of neighboring waters, there is one thing that sets this one apart.
target:
TEXT_REGOTH3SAKAZUKI_00407_IHAKI_000_021<tab>ちなみに海賊衆は、こうした物見砦をほかにも持ってるんだが、
この島は、ほかとは違う特別な意味があるのを知ってるか？

source: TEXT_REGOTH3SAKAZUKI_00407_IHAKI_000_022<tab>This is where the founding members of our organization first joined hands and toasted to the future. That is why we call this island “Sakazuki” or, quite literally, “the goblet.”
target:
TEXT_REGOTH3SAKAZUKI_00407_IHAKI_000_022<tab>何を隠そう、この島こそ海賊衆誕生の地……
最初の海賊たちが杯を交わし、兄弟となった場所なのよ！
だから、「サカズキ島」と呼ばれてるわけだな。

source: TEXT_REGOTH3SAKAZUKI_00407_IHAKI_000_023<tab>Even now the tradition carries on. We bring all of our newest recruits here that they might share a drink and thus be truly united. If you're looking to join us, I would be more than happy to recommend you to one of the higher-ups.
target:
TEXT_REGOTH3SAKAZUKI_00407_IHAKI_000_023<tab>今でも、新入りは、ここで兄弟の杯を交わして、
初めて、海賊衆と認められるんだ。
アンタも仲間入りしたいってんなら、頭を紹介してやるぜ？
